const TWILSOCK_URI = 'wss://tsock.twilio.com';
const TWILSOCK_PATH = '/v3/wsconnect';
 
/**
 * @param {String} token - authentication token
 * @param {Object} options - options to override defaults
 *
 * @class TwilsockConfig
 * @classdesc Settings container for the Twilsock client library
 */
export default class TwilsockConfig {
  constructor(token, options) {
    options = options || {};
    let _options = options.Twilsock || {};
    const twilsockUri = _options.uri || options.wsServer || TWILSOCK_URI;
 
    Object.defineProperties(this, {
      _twilsockWsHost: { value: twilsockUri + TWILSOCK_PATH },
      _token: { value: token, writable: true },
 
      twilsockUri: { get: () => this._twilsockWsHost },
      token: { get: () => this._token }
    });
  }
 
  updateToken(token) {
    this._token = token;
  }
}
